title: Enhancing Media Literacy in the Digital Age: Practice-Based Online Learning Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with digital device usage and everyday media consumption
context.additional_context: A practical learning environment for cultivating media literacy in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology context amid digital transformation.

learning_goals: Learners will acquire the ability to critically analyze various digital media contents (e.g., fact-checking, source verification).
Learners will be able to propose practical measures for personal information protection and digital citizenship in social media environments.
Learners will establish an action plan by applying ethical judgment criteria when producing and sharing media in daily life.

resources: Smartphone filming equipment for video lectures
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
